column4: how do i install the codecs for xmms the console couldnt find them...?
it doesnt play mp3 so far so i seem to need additional codecs for it
can anyone pls give me the adress to that wonderful site with lots of ubuntu software installations?
where can i dl that or do you have to buy it?
postal im referring to that is
set your vo to SDL, uses less CPU
man you lost me.  What media player are you using? Totem or Mplayer?

if you are using totem, install totem-xine.  If you want to use mplayer, you will need to read the mplayer manpage ('man mplayer') and read about how to edit your config file to specify video and audio output
do you have the win32codecs installed?
man, if you'd read the documentation, it'd be easier for you.
